If the browser chrome isn't isn't as high as the persona, the persona background is visible on top of the gray content border

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Make sure the browser chrome isn't too high (tabs on top, disable menu bar, disable toolbars).
2. Add a dark persona (such as http://www.getpersonas.com/en-US/persona/327836).
Actual Results:  
Notice that the persona covers the gray content borders on the left and right side of the browser

Expected Results:  
The persona should remain in the upper browser chrome area

See screenshot

We stopped calling the theme based "Personas" that name several years back, when they were also integrated into normal themes in Firefox.

Therefore bulk-closing Persona related bugs as they are no longer valid. If you are still having a potentially related issue in the latest version of Firefox, please take a look on our support site (https://support.mozilla.org) or file a new issue.
